The official lifecycle methods provided: Android 官方文档给出的生命周期方法
The callbacks that are registered in And: 在 Android 框架或第三方库中注册的回调函数
The callbacks that are registered in cod: 在应用包代码中注册的回调函数
The callbacks (or their related componen: 在 XML 文件中定义的回调函数 (或与其相关的组件)
The APIs that normally start a component: 通过 Intent 类型对象启动组件的典型 API
The APIs that atypically start a compone: 通过 PendingIntent 和/或 IntentSender 等类型对象启动组件的非典型 API
The Intent whose destination class is gi: 显式提供目标组件类的 Intent
The Intent whose destination class is ob: 通过 Intent Filter 匹配目标组件类的 Intent
The source or destination component is i: 源或目标组件是 Activity 类型
源或目标组件是 Service 类型
源或目标组件是 BroadcastReceiver 类型，且定义在 Android manifest 中
源或目标组件是 BroadcastReceiver 类型，且被动态注册
Fragment type is involved in the ICC inv: ICC 调用过程中有 Fragment 类型组件参与
Adapter type is involved in the ICC invo: ICC 调用过程中有 Adapter 类型组件参与
Widget type is involved in the ICC invoc: ICC 调用过程中有 Widget 类型组件参与
Other class type is involved in the ICC: ICC 调用过程中有其它自定义类型组件参与
Library invocation is involved in the IC: ICC 调用过程中包含库方法调用
Direct invocation to method in applicati: ICC 调用过程中包含到应用内函数的直接调用
Async invocation is involved in the ICC: ICC 调用过程中有包含异步调用
Listener invocation is involved in the I: ICC 调用过程中包含监听回调
Polymorphic usage is involved in the ICC: ICC 调用过程中包含多态用法
The static value is used to observe comp: 静态值被用于确定 Intent 对象的目标组件
The string operation is used to generate: 字符串操作被用于生成 Intent 对象的额外数据
The value of intent field is context-rel: Intent 域取值是上下文相关的
